content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code


SELECT 
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        HEADER_ROw=TRUE,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
    with (date_key VARCHAR(8),
date DATE,
year SMALLINT,
month SMALLINT,
day SMALLINT,
day_name VARCHAR(10)
,day_of_year SMALLINT
,week_of_month smallint
,week_of_year smallint
,month_name varchar(10)
,year_month VARCHAR(10)
,year_week varchar(7))
    AS [result]


exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''calendar.csv'',
        HEADER_ROw=TRUE,
        DATA_SOURCE=''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0''
    ) 
    with (date_key VARCHAR(8),
date DATE,
year SMALLINT,
month SMALLINT,
day SMALLINT,
day_name VARCHAR(10)
,day_of_year SMALLINT
,week_of_month smallint
,week_of_year smallint
,month_name varchar(10)
,year_month VARCHAR(10)
,year_week varchar(7))
    AS [result]'
